item.title: 工会称美国证券交易委员会员工无需担心停摆裁员问题
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）的一名高级工会官员告诉该机构的工作人员，如果政府下周关门，他们不应该对可能出现的大规模裁员感到 "焦虑"。【原文：U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission workers should not be "anxious" about potential mass layoffs if the government shuts down next week, a top union official has told agency staff.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普考虑根据芯片数量对外国电子产品征收关税
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府正在考虑根据每台设备中芯片的数量对外国电子设备征收关税，以促使企业将生产转移到美国。【原文：The Trump administration is considering imposing tariffs on foreign electronic devices based on the number of chips in each device, according to three people familiar with the matter, as it seeks to drive companies to shift their manufacturing to the United States.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Kraken 正在商谈以 200 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周五报道，加密货币交易所 Kraken 正在就获得新资金进行深入谈判，这笔资金可能使该公司估值达到约 200 亿美元。【原文：Crypto exchange Kraken is in advanced talks to secure fresh funding that could value the company at about $20 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰将硅谷芯片集团分拆为新公司
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周五将硅谷的一群芯片专家分拆成一家新公司，致力于为自动驾驶汽车、无人机和其他车辆打造新一代计算大脑。【原文：Mercedes-Benz on Friday spun out into a new company a group of chip experts in Silicon Valley that is working on creating a new generation of computing brains for self-driving cars, drones and other vehicles.】

item.title: BMO 将标准普尔 500 指数 2025 年年底目标价上调至 7,000 点
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场（BMO Capital Markets）周五表示，将把 2025 年年底的 S&P 500 指数目标从 6,700 点上调至 7,000 点，理由是美联储降息和盈利强劲等因素。【原文：BMO Capital Markets said on Friday that it was revising its year-end 2025 target for the S&P 500 to 7,000 from 6,700 citing factors including Federal Reserve rate cuts and strong earnings.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）与洪都拉斯就信贷计划第四次审查达成员工层面协议
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周五表示，它已与洪都拉斯达成了一项工作人员级别的协议，以完成对其两项贷款机制的第四次审查，为今年晚些时候支付约 1.2 亿美元铺平道路。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said on Friday it has reached a staff-level agreement with Honduras to complete the fourth review of two of its facilities, paving the way for a disbursement of about $120 million later this year.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储的米兰数学可能夸大了移民对通胀的影响
item.description: 一位曾为美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）的论点提供研究基础的经济学家表示，这位新任央行行长夸大了这一影响，他认为唐纳德-特朗普总统打击移民的政策将通过削减住房需求来减缓通胀。【原文：An economist whose research provided a foundation for Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran's argument that President Donald Trump's immigration crackdown will slow inflation by cutting demand for housing says the new central banker is overstating the impact.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，电子艺界接近达成约 500 亿美元的私有化交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，视频游戏制造商电子艺界（Electronic Arts）正接近达成一项私有化交易，价格高达 500 亿美元。【原文：Videogame maker Electronic Arts is nearing a deal to go private for as much as $50 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，根据特朗普的最新计划，英国将面临 100% 的药品关税
item.description: 消息人士周五告诉路透社，根据唐纳德-特朗普总统的最新计划，英国进口到美国的药品将面临100%的关税。【原文：Britain would face 100% tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S. under President Donald Trump's latest plan, sources told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通任命苏尼为 ECM 国际部新主管
item.description: 根据路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通已任命 Sunil Dhupelia 为新的国际股权资本市场主管。【原文：JPMorgan has appointed Sunil Dhupelia as the new head of equity capital markets international, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 辛克莱周五结束抵制 ABC 电视台播放基梅尔节目的行动
item.description: 辛克莱广播集团（Sinclair Broadcast Group）周五表示，将停止抢播《吉米-金梅尔现场直播》（Jimmy Kimmel Live!【原文：Sinclair Broadcast Group said on Friday it will end its preemption of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" and the show will return in the evening on Sinclair’s nearly 40 ABC-affiliated stations.】

item.title: 美国告诉印度，俄罗斯石油禁令是贸易协议取得进展的关键
item.description: 两位熟悉谈判情况的人士告诉路透社记者，美国贸易谈判代表已告诉印度同行，遏制购买俄罗斯石油对降低印度关税率和达成贸易协议至关重要。【原文：U.S. trade negotiators have told their Indian counterparts that curbing purchases of Russian oil is crucial to reducing India's tariff rate and sealing a trade deal, two people familiar with the talks told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，MRI 软件公司的私募股权所有者的目标是以 100 亿美元的估值出售或 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，房地产软件供应商 MRI Software 的私募股权所有者正在探索公司的各种选择，包括潜在的出售或在美国交易所公开上市。【原文：The private equity owners of real estate software provider MRI Software are exploring options for the company, including a potential sale or a public listing on a U.S. exchange, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音公司与 IAM 工会恢复合同谈判
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会与波音公司周五表示，双方同意在联邦调解员的帮助下于周一恢复谈判，以努力结束近两个月的罢工。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers and Boeing have agreed to return to negotiations on Monday with the help of a federal mediator in an effort to end a near two-month strike, the union said on Friday.】

item.title: 贝克休斯称美国油气钻机数量升至 6 月以来最高水平
item.description: 能源服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周五在其密切关注的报告中称，美国能源公司本周连续第四周增加石油和天然气钻机，这是自二月份以来的首次。【原文：U.S. energy firms this week added oil and natural gas rigs for a fourth week in a row for the first time since February, energy services firm Baker Hughes said in its closely followed report on Friday.】

item.title: 保险初创企业 Ethos Technologies 申请在美国上市
item.description: 保险科技初创公司 Ethos Technologies 周五在美国提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Insurtech startup Ethos Technologies filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday.】

item.title: 亚马逊失去帮助领导人工通用智能开发的副总裁
item.description: 路透社调查后证实，亚马逊一位负责人工智能项目的副总裁将于周五离职。【原文：An Amazon vice president helping to oversee one of the company's highest profile projects, artificial general intelligence, is stepping down on Friday, the online retailer confirmed after a Reuters inquiry.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称需要果断降息抵消劳动力市场风险
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周五重申，她认为需要果断降息，以抵御就业市场日益严重的问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice-chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman reiterated Friday that she believes decisive interest rate cuts are needed to ward off rising trouble in the job market.】

item.title: 随着人工智能模型推动美国以外地区的增长，Anthropic 将把国际员工人数增加两倍
item.description: Anthropic 公司周五表示，公司计划今年将国际员工人数增加两倍，并将应用人工智能团队扩大五倍，以满足美国以外地区对其克劳德人工智能模型激增的需求。【原文：Anthropic said on Friday it plans to triple its international workforce and expand its applied artificial intelligence team by fivefold this year to meet a surge in demand for its Claude AI models outside the United States.】

item.title: Cecafe 总裁表示，如果关税维持不变，巴西对美国的咖啡出口将进一步下降
item.description: 出口商集团 Cecafe 的负责人 Marcio Ferreira 说，如果美国继续征收关税，巴西对美国的咖啡出口将进一步下降。【原文：Brazil coffee exports to the United States will decline further if U.S. tariffs remain in place, Marcio Ferreira, the head of exporter group Cecafe said, adding the industry was pleased by warming relations between the leaders of the two countries.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，软银和 Ark 正在洽谈加入 Tether 的主要融资轮
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，软银集团（SoftBank Group）和方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）正在就一轮融资进行早期谈判，该轮融资对稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings 的估值可能高达 5000 亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group and Ark Investment Management are in early talks to invest in a funding round that could value stablecoin issuer Tether Holdings at as much as $500 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷批准麦克伊文公司价值 27 亿美元的铜矿项目享受税收减免计划
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长周五表示，阿根廷已批准加拿大矿商麦克伊文铜业公司（McEwen Copper）价值 27 亿美元的洛斯阿祖列斯（Los Azules）铜矿项目享受一项名为 "大型投资奖励制度"（RIGI）的税收减免计划。【原文：Argentina has approved Canadian miner McEwen Copper's $2.7 billion Los Azules copper project in the country for a tax break program known as the Large Investment Incentive Regime (RIGI), the nation's economy minister said on Friday.】

item.title: 订购巴西航空工业公司飞机后，拉美航空将新增多达 30 个巴西目的地
item.description: 拉美航空一位高管周五表示，该公司将 "相对较快 "地收到从巴西航空工业公司订购的 E195-E2 喷气式飞机，并预计这些飞机将使该公司在巴西新增 25 至 30 个目的地。【原文：LATAM Airlines will receive the E195-E2 jets it ordered from Embraer "relatively quickly" and expects them to allow the carrier to add 25 to 30 new destinations in Brazil, an executive said on Friday.】

item.title: 德国汽车制造商将在 10 月份的峰会上与总理默茨会面
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，德国顶级汽车制造商的高管将在计划于 10 月 9 日在柏林举行的峰会上与德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨会面。【原文：Executives of Germany's top carmakers will meet Chancellor Friedrich Merz at a summit planned for October 9 in Berlin, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国众议院议员誓言对 TikTok 出售交易进行全面监督并举行听证会
item.description: 美国国会众议院中国问题特别委员会主席周五表示，他将对中国字节跳动公司出售短视频应用 TikTok 美国资产的交易进行全面监督。【原文：The chair of the House Select Committee on China said Friday he will conduct full oversight over a deal for Chinese-based ByteDance to sell U.S. assets of short video app TikTok that was approved by President Donald under a 2024 law.】

item.title: 亚洲和欧洲制药商进口到美国市场的品牌药品
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四宣布，从10月1日起对进口品牌药品征收100%的关税，除非这些药品的生产商已在美国破土动工建厂。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday unveiled a 100% tariff on imports of branded drugs from October 1, unless their producers had already broken ground on U.S. manufacturing plants.】

item.title: 独家报道星巴克首席技术官周一辞职，临时任命
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份发给公司员工的内部备忘录显示，星巴克首席技术官 Deb Hall Lefevre 辞职，但没有找到永久替代者。【原文：Starbucks' chief technology officer Deb Hall Lefevre resigned without a permanent replacement, according to an internal memo sent to corporate staff on Monday, seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 调查显示：捷豹路虎停产促使供应商裁员和减少工时
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，捷豹路虎公司在网络攻击后停产正在打击英国西米德兰兹地区的企业，已有企业为此裁员或削减工时。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover's production shutdown after a cyberattack is hitting businesses in Britain's West Midlands region, a survey showed on Friday, with firms already making redundancies or cutting staff hours in response.】

item.title: 西南航空公司就员工军休问题支付 1,850 万美元
item.description: 西南航空公司同意支付 1850 万美元，以了结一项集体诉讼，该诉讼指控该航空公司未向休短期军假的员工提供带薪休假。【原文：Southwest Airlines agreed to pay $18.5 million to settle a class action accusing the carrier of failing to provide paid leave to employees who took short-term military leave.】

item.title: 有了美国的支持，阿根廷赢得了时间--但十月的投票至关重要
item.description: 投资者说，阿根廷本周与美国的 "不惜一切代价 "可能给了该国摆脱数十年混乱的债务违约和救助的最佳机会。但一切都取决于十月的全国大选。【原文：Argentina's "whatever it takes" moment with the United States this week may have given the country its best chance to escape decades of chaotic debt defaults and bailouts, investors say. But everything hinges on October's nationwide election.】
